captions.text: - Hey, Andrew, are you and Ashley dating?
- Ugh. Everyone's being so creepy tonight.
If another guy comes up to me,
can you pretend to be my girlfriend?
- Yeah, if we can make out.
Can you just massage right here?
- I don't know, maybe you slept weird.
- Ugh, Andrew won't text me back.
- I know, I wish I was a lesbian.
I feel like it'd be easier.
Then I could date Jennifer Lawrence.

- And we both think Karlie
Kloss and Taylor Swift
are together, and we both love Beyonce.
We just have so much in common.
- No, there's like a connection there.
- I think you guys are just friends.
- I think I'm about to get my period.
Do my boobs look big to you?
- Thank you for getting the door.
- Oh, thanks. You're so sweet to me.
Why can't guys be this sweet to me?
I wish I could just date you.
You hate them. We hate them.

title: Things Straight Girls Do That Drive You Crazy

comments.text:
There's this girl who I think is pretty and adorable who happens to be my 
bestfriend and I think I like like her? I don't know. I don't really see 
myself as a bi before because I'm crushing on guys but every minute of the 
day, she's always on my mind and I get really jelous when she's around her 
guy friends. She's really sweet to me like she always hold my hand and 
kisses me on the cheeks but she's just addressing me as her bestfriend. She 
calls me bae at text tho, so I can really relate to the bae thing on the 
vid. Haha. I'm really confused if I just misunderstood her sweetness to 
affection. I can't tell her how I feel because I'm afraid that this will 
affect our friendship.I'm really glad that I bumped into this video and I 
can relate to this and the other commenters. Thanks for reading my long 
comment, we're graduating college tomorrow and I don't know if I should 
tell her or not. Maybe It'd be better if we'd just stay friends, no? ;) 
(I'm not hating on bis, gays, and lesbians because my sister is a bi and 
I'm totally okay with it)﻿
